text: Yeah I have that in there but nothing shows up. And I don’t see any way in the post editor to actually edit that content, so it’s probably showing up but there’s just nothing in it. How do I edit that post body content?
Hmmm you can’t add any default content to it. But it should show up on the left as a module when you go into an individual blog post? Can you send me a screenshot of what you’re seeing?
Weird, I opened it up today and it’s all working fine now. Very strange. Thanks for whatever you did!  :joy:
